item.title: 德国电力成本是法国电力的九倍
item.description: 德国由于可再生能源产量低迷和碳成本高企而导致电价飙升，而核电供应的法国仍然没有受到电价波动的影响。【原文：Germany saw soaring power prices on subdued renewable output and high carbon costs, while nuclear-supplied France remained shielded from the volatility.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克计划削减 27 亿欧元赤字以避免评级下调
item.description: 斯洛伐克宣布在 2026 年实施 27 亿欧元（32 亿美元）的一揽子减支增税计划，以避免评级进一步下调。【原文：Slovakia announced a €2.7 billion ($3.2 billion) package of spending cuts and tax increases for 2026 to avert further rating downgrades.】

item.title: 盎格鲁收购泰克，掀起期待已久的交易狂潮
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）大举收购泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd.），意在打造一个规模超过 500 亿美元的矿业巨头。对于交易商和高管们来说，这也可能为行业内的一轮重大交易鸣响了发令枪。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s swoop to buy Teck Resources Ltd. is intended to create a mining giant more than $50 billion in size. For dealmakers and executives, it may also have fired the starting gun on a round of major industry deals.】

item.title: 据说 Klarna 美国首次公开募股的定价将高于市场范围
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Klarna Group Plc 正告知投资者，预计其首次公开募股的定价将高达 12.7 亿美元，高于其营销范围。【原文：Klarna Group Plc is telling investors it expects to price its initial public offering of as much as $1.27 billion above its marketing range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 花旗银行认为库纳货币将因货币紧缩而上涨
item.description: 花旗集团和德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）的策略师认为，随着捷克央行发出偏好紧缩货币政策以抑制持续通胀风险的信号，捷克克朗将扩大涨幅。【原文：The Czech koruna is set to extend its gains as the central bank signals preference for tight monetary policy to suppress persistent inflation risks, according to strategists from Citigroup Inc. and Commerzbank AG.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"深知其石油增产并非看上去那么简单
item.description: 当欧佩克+开始向供过于求的市场注入更多原油时，石油交易商并没有惊慌失措，这其中有一个特别好的理由。【原文：There’s an especially good reason why oil traders aren’t panicking as OPEC+ starts pouring even more crude into an oversupplied market.】

item.title: 美国就业人数初值减少 91.1 万人，创历史新高
item.description: 在截至 3 月份的一年中，美国的就业增长远不如之前报告的那么强劲，这使得美联储面临的降息压力越来越大。【原文：US job growth was far less robust in the year through March than previously reported, adding to mounting pressure on the Federal Reserve to lower interest rates.】

item.title: 美国财政部在监管演练中挖掘 30 年期债券的大持有者
item.description: 美国财政部在 6 月初要求 30 年期国债的大额持有者表明身份。【原文：The US Treasury Department asked large holders of a 30-year Treasury security in early June to identify themselves.】

item.title: Stellantis 分三部分出售美国高等级债券
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，吉普车制造商 Stellantis NV 将于周二出售多达三部分的高等级债券。【原文：Jeep maker Stellantis NV is selling high-grade bonds in as many as three parts on Tuesday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 湾区公交公司将在州政府资金停滞后动用联邦贷款
item.description: 旧金山湾区捷运（Bay Area Rapid Transit）正在寻求从一项联邦计划中借款，而此前加利福尼亚州的官员们一直在拖延一项更大的救助计划，这使得资金紧张的旧金山湾区捷运系统压力倍增。【原文：San Francisco’s Bay Area Rapid Transit is looking to borrow money from a federal program after California officials stalled a larger bailout, escalating pressure on the cash-strapped system.】

item.title: 巴克莱认为加纳塞地可能因降息而进一步走软
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）预计，随着国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）计划的结束，加纳中央银行可能会进一步降息，同时政府支出也会增加，因此加纳的塞地到年底时将进一步走软。【原文：Barclays Plc expects Ghana’s cedi to weaken further by year-end on a possible additional interest-rate cut by the central bank, alongside increased government spending, as an International Monetary Fund program winds down.】

item.title: 美国股市在就业修正前攀升，降息押注上升
item.description: 在备受关注的劳动力市场和通胀数据修正之前，美国股市在周二开盘时小幅收涨，投资者认为这些数据将为美联储的降息步伐定下基调。【原文：US equities eked out small gains at Tuesday’s open ahead of a closely watched revision to labor market and inflation data, which investors believe will set the tone for the pace of Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: 大赦国际称巴基斯坦窃听公民电话和位置
item.description: 大赦国际称，巴基斯坦建立了全面的监控系统，通过中国设计的防火墙窃听电话、跟踪位置和过滤在线内容。【原文：Pakistan has built sweeping surveillance systems that taps phone calls, tracks location and filters online content through a Chinese-designed firewall, according to Amnesty International.】

item.title: 赛勒模式举步维艰，加密货币财政炒作成疑
item.description: 这并不难预见。股票飙升得太快，承诺变得太大，计算方法也变得太奇怪。这些新公司本应为投资者进入数字资产热潮提供有利可图的途径。然而，随着这些公司股价的下跌和市场信心的下滑，问题并不在于这种模式是否面临压力。越来越多的人关心的是，这种模式会以怎样的方式悄无声息地分崩离析。【原文：It wasn’t hard to see it coming. The stocks had soared too fast, the promises had gotten too big, and the math had gotten too weird. These new companies — public firms built to buy crypto and often doing little else — were supposed to offer investors a lucrative way into the digital-asset boom. Instead, as their stock prices fall and market confidence slips, the question isn’t whether the model is under pressure. Increasingly, it’s how, and how quietly, it could fall apart.】

item.title: 基于区块链的贷款公司 Figure 将首次公开募股规模扩大至 6.93 亿美元
item.description: 由于投资者对这家基于区块链的信贷公司的股票需求强劲，Figure Technology Solutions Inc.【原文：Figure Technology Solutions Inc. increased the potential size of its initial public offering to as much as $693 million amid strong investor demand for the blockchain-based credit company’s shares.】

item.title: Cottonwood 完成 10 亿美元的房地产特殊情况基金
item.description: 私人房地产投资公司 Cottonwood Group 为特殊情况（包括需要财务重组、新开发或其他潜在高收益机会的房地产）关闭了一个 10 亿美元的基金。【原文：Private real estate investment firm Cottonwood Group closed a $1 billion fund for special situations, including properties needing financial restructuring, new development or other potentially high-yielding opportunities.】

item.title: 贝莱德任命科威特新主管，深化中东业务
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc. has named a country head for its new office in Kuwait, as the world’s largest asset manager deepens ties to the oil-rich region.】

item.title: 埃克森、雪佛龙认为即使有俄罗斯管道，中国天然气需求仍将增长
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）和雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp. ）看好中国未来对液化天然气的需求，即使俄罗斯成功地为这个亚洲国家增加了另一条管道。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. and Chevron Corp. are bullish on China’s future appetite for liquefied natural gas even if Russia succeeds in adding another pipeline to the Asian nation.】

item.title: 雪佛龙将增加天然气供应以满足埃及 "永不满足 "的需求
item.description: 雪佛龙公司全球天然气总裁弗里曼-沙欣（Freeman Shaheen）说，雪佛龙公司正在努力增加对埃及的天然气供应，埃及对这种燃料有着 "难以满足的需求"。【原文：Chevron Corp. is working to boost supply of natural gas to Egypt, which has “insatiable appetite” for the fuel, Freeman Shaheen, the company’s president for global gas, said.】

item.title: 意大利降低债券收益率为梅洛尼带来 130 亿欧元意外之财
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，由于借贷成本降低，意大利官员在编制政府预算时假定会有多达 130 亿欧元（153 亿美元）的额外财政空间。【原文：Italian officials preparing the government’s budget are assuming as much as €13 billion ($15.3 billion) in extra fiscal space because of lower borrowing costs, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥通胀率升幅超预期，墨西哥银行放缓减息步伐
item.description: 在墨西哥央行放缓降息步伐之后，墨西哥上个月的年度通胀加速度超过了预期。【原文：Mexico’s annual inflation accelerated more than expected last month after the central bank slowed the pace of interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 国王街校友耗资 10 亿美元的新公司将成为本年度最大的公司之一
item.description: 前国王街资本管理公司（King Street Capital Management）合伙人保罗-戈德施密德（Paul Goldschmid）准备以超过 10 亿美元的资金推出他的信贷对冲基金，这将成为本年度最大的首次亮相基金之一。【原文：Former King Street Capital Management partner Paul Goldschmid is poised to launch his credit-focused hedge fund with more than $1 billion, making it one of the year’s biggest debuts.】

item.title: 阿拉比卡咖啡溢价因供应担忧跃升至 2011 年高点
item.description: 由于担心高端咖啡豆供应紧张，阿拉比卡咖啡相对于罗布斯塔咖啡的溢价上升到 2011 年的水平。【原文：Arabica’s premium over robusta coffee rose to levels last seen in 2011 on worries over tight supplies of the high-end beans.】

item.title: 匈牙利与壳牌签署 10 年期天然气协议，欧盟准备退出俄罗斯天然气供应
item.description: 匈牙利与壳牌石油公司（Shell Plc）达成了一项为期 10 年的天然气供应协议，这标志着匈牙利在欧盟逐步停止进口俄罗斯天然气的最后期限临近之际，为摆脱俄罗斯天然气供应而迈出的第一步。【原文：Hungary clinched a 10-year gas supply agreement with Shell Plc, marking one of its first steps to diversify away from Russian flows as a European Union deadline to phase out those imports nears.】

item.title: 贝雅收购加拿大萨加德公司股份，推动私人基金发展
item.description: Robert W. Baird & Co.正在收购加拿大另类资产管理公司 Sagard Holdings Inc.【原文：Robert W. Baird & Co. is buying a stake in Canadian alternative asset manager Sagard Holdings Inc., becoming its first US institutional shareholder in a deal that also includes distribution of Sagard funds.】

item.title: 在奥尔扎格的增收计划中，拉扎德将目光投向了中东地区
item.description: 作为首席执行官彼得-奥尔萨格（Peter Orszag）长达数年的公司收入翻番计划的一部分，拉扎德公司（Lazard Inc.【原文：Lazard Inc. is aiming to station half a dozen bankers in its newly-opened office in Abu Dhabi as part of Chief Executive Officer Peter Orszag’s yearslong plan to double the firm’s revenue.】

item.title: 花粉街资本向中东金融科技公司投资 1 亿美元
item.description: 随着中东地区对私人信贷需求的增加，Pollen Street Capital 向阿拉伯联合酋长国的中小型公司贷款机构 CredibleX 提供了 1 亿美元的贷款。【原文：Pollen Street Capital extended a $100 million lending facility to CredibleX, a United Arab Emirates-based lender to small-and-medium sized companies, as demand for private credit in the Middle East rises.】

item.title: 里夫斯称英国可能需要国际货币基金组织救助的说法 "并不严重
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）对反对党保守党暗示英国可能需要向国际货币基金组织寻求救助的说法进行了回击，称这种说法 "不负责任"。【原文：Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves hit back at the opposition Conservative Party for suggesting the UK may need to seek a bailout from the International Monetary Fund, calling the claim “irresponsible.”】

item.title: B.莱利在报告延迟后更换审计员
